title: ICE: `unexpected rib kind: ConstGeneric` in `late.rs`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
This is a fuzzed test case, found with [tree-splicer](https://github.com/langston-barrett/tree-splicer) and minimized with [`treereduce`](https://github.com/langston-barrett/treereduce). I wasn't able to find any similar issues: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3AI-ICE+unexpected+rib+kind ### Code ```Rust struct Bar S<'a>)>; ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (22f247c6f 2023-03-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: 22f247c6f3ed388cb702d01c2ff27da658a8b353 commit-date: 2023-03-13 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_resolve/src/late.rs:1483:41: unexpected rib kind: ConstGeneric ```
Backtrace

``` error[E0637]: `&` without an explicit lifetime name cannot be used here --> ice.rs:1:21 | 1 | struct Bar S<'a>)>; | ^ explicit lifetime name needed here error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_resolve/src/late.rs:1483:41: unexpected rib kind: ConstGeneric --> ice.rs:1:33 | 1 | struct Bar S<'a>)>; | ^^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/22f247c6f3ed388cb702d01c2ff27da658a8b353/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:995:33 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f256460451a -
